original_title: Hambantota Refinery: Seven firms submit EOIs
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Seven companies have submitted EOIs for the proposed New Refinery in Hambantota by the deadline fixed for Monday (27).
Power and Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekera tweeted that the technical evaluation committee & other procurement committees will evaluate EOIs and issue the RFPs to suitable applicants.

Fuel distribution back to normal, TU leaders persona non grata – CPC
